code: import{notification as antdNotification}from"antd";export var notification={error:function error(message){return antdNotification.error({message:message,placement:"bottomRight",key:"error"});},success:function success(message){return antdNotification.success({message:message,placement:"bottomRight"});},info:function info(message){return antdNotification.info({message:message,placement:"bottomRight",key:"info"});}};
